title: HYBRID COMPUTING ARRANGEMENTS  (optical hybrid computing devices G06E3/00; {fuzzy computing G06N7/02}; neural networks for image data processing G06T; analog/digital conversion, in general H03M1/00)
definition_statement: This place covers: A "hybrid computing arrangement" is an arrangement in which part of the computation is digital and part is analogue.

title: Hybrid computing arrangements  (digitally-programmed analogue computers G06G7/06)
special_rules: This is now considered obsolete technology and hardly receives new patent applications.
definition_statement: This place covers: Combination of digital and analogue computation technologies or methods in a single machine.

title: Systems for conjoint operation of complete digital and complete analogue computers
special_rules: This is now considered obsolete technology and hardly receives new patent applications.
definition_statement: This place covers: Combination of a separate digital computer and a separate analogue computer in order to perform a computation.
